attributes.action: Implement a breathalyser to determine if a person has covid to save the world.
attributes.additional_details: Is only the government that has the power to tell or control the big companies and is the duty of government to protect their people.
attributes.background: To order appropriate research, tech or biotech companies to develop a breathalyser type kits to detect the covid strains. This will on spot of any business, be carried out on people, and stop the spread of the virus and business can carry on with their daily work. Can be used for home use to.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  The UK Government and Parliament can't direct private companies to undertake research. 

You could start a petition calling for the Government to fund research into Covid-19 testing, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
